channel.title: MA 332: Algebraic Topology
channel.description: Recent content on MA 332: Algebraic Topology

item.title: Homology from definitions
item.description: Let $X$ be a topological space and $|X|$ be the set of path-connected components of $X$. (a). Show that $H_0(X)$ is isomorphic to the free abelian group generated by $|X|$. (b). For $n\geq 0$, show that $H_n(X) \cong \oplus_{j\in |X|} H_n(X_j)$, where $\{X_j\}_{j \in |X|}$ are the connected components of $X$. Recall that the augmented chain complex for a topological space $X$ has $C_{-1}(X) = \mathbb{Z}$ and $\partial_{-1} = 0$.
Course Details Instructor: Siddhartha Gadgil E-mail: siddhartha.gadgil@gmail.com Office: N-15, Department of Mathematics, IISc.
